hook.text: Mussolini invented fascism. It promised national rebirth, strong leadership, and crushing all opposition.

buildup.text: Fascism combines ultranationalism, authoritarianism, and the cult of a strong leader above the law.

discovery.text: Nazi Germany and Fascist Italy built war machines, suppressed dissent, and murdered millions.

twist.text: Fascism doesn't always announce itself. It can creep in through democratic elections and gradual erosion.

climax.text: Scholars debate whether modern movements qualify as fascist. The label is powerful and politically charged.

punchline.text: Fascism promises strength and order. It delivers war and destruction.

quiz.question: Who invented fascism as a political movement?
